content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:doap="http://usefulinc.com/ns/doap#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:admin="http://webns.net/mvcb/" xml:lang="en">   <rdf:Description rdf:about="">     <admin:generatorAgent rdf:resource="http://doapy.bonjourlesmouettes.org/doap-a-matic"/>   </rdf:Description>   <doap:Project>     <doap:name>IsaViz: A Visual Authoring Tool for RDF</doap:name>     <doap:shortname>IsaViz</doap:shortname>     <doap:homepage rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/11/IsaViz/"/>     <doap:created>2001-11-01</doap:created>     <doap:description>IsaViz is a visual environment for browsing and authoring RDF models represented as graphs. It features a 2.5D user interface allowing smooth zooming and navigation in the graph. It allows the  creation and editing of graphs by drawing ellipses, boxes and arcs.  IsaViz provides support for GSS stylesheets, a visual debugger for FSL path expressions, and will soon support the Fresnel ontology for modeling RDF data presentation knowledge.</doap:description>     <doap:shortdesc>Visual environment for browsing and authoring RDF models represented as graphs.</doap:shortdesc>     <doap:mailing-list rdf:resource="http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-isaviz/"/>     <doap:screenshots rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/11/IsaViz/images/isv8.png"/>     <doap:programming-language>Java</doap:programming-language>     <doap:license rdf:resource="http://usefulinc.com/doap/licenses/w3c"/>     <doap:download-page rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/11/IsaViz/"/>     <doap:maintainer>       <foaf:Person>         <foaf:name>Emmanuel Pietriga</foaf:name>         <foaf:mbox_sha1sum>9f1c3d906a2f41f3ff5b7a566e385aa4fe7d704a</foaf:mbox_sha1sum>         <rdfs:seeAlso rdf:resource="http://www.lri.fr/~pietriga/foaf.rdf"/>       </foaf:Person>     </doap:maintainer>     <doap:repository>       <doap:CVSRepository>         <doap:anon-root>:pserver:anonymous@dev.w3.org:/sources/public/java/classes/org/w3c/IsaViz</doap:anon-root>         <doap:module>IsaViz</doap:module>         <doap:browse rdf:resource="http://dev.w3.org/cvsweb/java/classes/org/w3c/IsaViz/"/>       </doap:CVSRepository>     </doap:repository>   </doap:Project> </rdf:RDF>
